Package org.microbean.constant

package org.microbean.constant
Provides classes and interfaces related to dynamic constants.
Author:
Laird Nelson
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Constables
    A utility class containing static methods that can describe various things in Constable ways.
    ConstantDescs
    A utiliy class containing useful ConstantDescs (mostly ClassDescs).
